original_title: Kidsongs: We Wish You a Merry Christmas
overview: Experience the magical and musical holiday season with the Kidsongs Kids. This a show your family will want to watch every holiday season! Songs: Deck the Halls, Frosty the Snowman, Jingle Bells, Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer and more!
title: Kidsongs: We Wish You a Merry Christmas
